'''''Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to get swept up in the strong currents of [[Fontaine]].

==Trivia==
* This achievement can also be obtained via the [[Summertide Scales and Tales/Boreal Flurry|Boreal Flurry]] game mode in [[Simulanka]] during the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event.
* The name of this achievement is likely a reference to ''{{w|Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Seas}}'', a classic 1870 science fiction novel by the French writer {{w|Jules Verne}}.
